parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To prevent, debar, hinder; with infin: from doing so and so. From the base of kolazo; to estop, i.e. Prevent.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Always, at all times, ever. From pas and hote; every when, i.e. At all times.
From ana and pleroo; to complete; by implication, to occupy, supply; figuratively, to accomplish.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
(a) an end, (b) event or issue, (c) the principal end, aim, purpose, (d) a tax.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Apparently a primary verb; to be beforehand, i.e. Anticipate or precede; by extension, to have arrived at.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
